__TOC__

=== Basic Resources ===
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Testing-CheckingMTDevice]]</nowiki> - How to find your device ID and test it for multi-touch capability
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Testing-UsingGeisview]]</nowiki> - Using the <code>geisview</code> tool to see if you're getting expected  events
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Testing-Evemu]]</nowiki> - Recording and playback of touch events and gestures; extremely useful for debugging
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Testing-UsingMtview]]</nowiki> - A visual feedback tool that shows touch points, sizes, disconnects, offsets, etc.
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Testing-UsingUCube]]</nowiki>  - Another visual feedback tool, but instead of touch points checking, does gesture checking
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Ginn]]</nowiki>  - A tool to provide multitouch support in legacy applications without recoding; Ginn can be very helpful in testing a MT setup
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch-Calibration-Ntrig]]</nowiki> - A tool for calibrating N-Trig hardware.
